galleryItems.headline: When darkness overspreads my eyes
galleryItems.content: When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees...
galleryItems.caption: A serene view of the valley.

galleryItems.headline: Give people courage
galleryItems.content: The sunset faded to twilight before anything further happened. The crowd far away on the left, towards Woking, seemed to grow...
galleryItems.caption: A crowd gathering as the sun sets.

galleryItems.headline: May the Force be with you
galleryItems.subheadline: Let go your conscious self and act on instinct
galleryItems.content: Partially, but it also obeys your commands. Hey, Luke! May the Force be with you. I have traced the Rebel spies to her...
galleryItems.caption: "This time, let go your conscious self and act on instinct."

galleryItems.headline: The buzz of the little world
galleryItems.content: I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now...
galleryItems.caption: A close-up view of nature's buzz.

galleryItems.headline: It wasn't a dream
galleryItems.content: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin...
galleryItems.caption: Kafka's world brought to life.
